name: Leoforce
description: Leoforce is the company behind Arya, the recruiting technology that combines advanced AI and Talent Intelligence – technology with a human touch that empowers talent acquisition professionals with a deeper, multidimensional understanding of people, jobs, and what makes them compatible. A comprehensive AI-sourcing tool that is revolutionizing talent discovery and engagement by accurately predicting the probability of candidate success, Arya is the most efficient sourcing tool for capturing top talent before the competition. Through a single, data-backed eco-system with powerful, advanced search and match, multichannel communication, and talent scoring and ranking capabilities, Arya cuts shortlisting time in half, and delivers candidates who are not only qualified, but more likely to succeed in every open role.
features: We hold ourselves, our employees, and our partners to the highest standards
Headline:
With Arya, go beyond
 AI recruiting
ShortDescription: Leoforce is the company behind Arya –AI-driven solutions and services that empower talent acquisition organizations, staffing agencies, and your in-house recruiting teams to quickly source and score the talent most likely to succeed in every open role.

Highlights.name: Increase Candidate Quality by up to 70%
Highlights.description: Using 7 multidimensional data points and hundreds of attributes to score and rank candidates, Arya helps you identify top talent driving measurable improvements to candidate quality.

Highlights.name: Reduce Time to Submit by up to 50%
Highlights.description: Arya seamlessly pulls candidate data from 80+ ATS/CRM, job boards & sourcing channels, consolidating sources and automating searches to deliver a single deduplicated list of candidates.

Highlights.name: Enhance Engagement and the Candidate Experience
Highlights.description: Reach top talent before your rivals with access to new and updated candidate information daily, a 24/7 AI recruiting assistant, and a centralized multi-channel communication dashboard.

enhanced_description: Leoforce is the company behind Arya, an AI-driven recruiting technology designed to revolutionize talent discovery and engagement. Arya combines advanced AI and Talent Intelligence with a human touch, empowering talent acquisition professionals, staffing agencies, and in-house recruiting teams with a deeper, multidimensional understanding of people, jobs, and compatibility. It functions as a comprehensive AI-sourcing tool that accurately predicts the probability of candidate success. Through a single, data-backed ecosystem, Arya offers powerful, advanced search and match, multichannel communication, and robust talent scoring and ranking capabilities. The platform delivers measurable improvements, including up to a 70% increase in candidate quality by scoring candidates using 7 multidimensional data points and hundreds of attributes, and a reduction in time to submit by up to 50% by seamlessly pulling and deduplicating candidate data from over 80 ATS/CRM systems, job boards, and other sourcing channels. Arya also enhances engagement and the candidate experience with daily updated candidate information, a 24/7 AI recruiting assistant, and a centralized multi-channel communication dashboard, enabling users to capture top talent efficiently before the competition.
key_use_cases: Consolidating candidate data from multiple sources (ATS/CRM, job boards)
Enhancing candidate experience with AI assistant
competitive_advantages: Advanced AI and Talent Intelligence for candidate success prediction
Ability to increase candidate quality by up to 70%
Ability to reduce time to submit candidates by up to 50%
Efficiently cuts shortlisting time in half
Comprehensive data consolidation from 80+ ATS/CRM and sourcing channels
Powerful, advanced search and match capabilities
Access to new and updated candidate information daily
roi_benefits: Up to 70% increase in candidate quality
Up to 50% reduction in time to submit candidates
